query.statement: SELECT A.RECIPE_CD, B.RECIPE_NAME,A.RECIPE_SEQ, C.ITEM_CODE, F.ITEM_NAME, ROUND((C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)),2) AS MATERIAL_QTY, --"자재량", NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0) AS DISUSE_RATE, --"폐기율", ROUND(NVL(CAL,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS CAL, --"열량", ROUND(NVL(WATER,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS WATER, --"수분", ROUND(NVL(PROT,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS PROT, --"단백질", ROUND(NVL(FAT,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS FAT, --"지질", ROUND(NVL(CARBO,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS CARBO, --"당질", ROUND(NVL(FIBER,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS FIBER, --"섬유소", ROUND(NVL(ASH,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS ASH, --"회분", ROUND(NVL(CA,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS CA, --"칼슘", ROUND(NVL(P,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS P, --"인분", ROUND(NVL(FE,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS FE, --"철분", ROUND(NVL(NA,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS NA, --"나트륨", ROUND(NVL(K,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS K, --"칼륨", ROUND(NVL(VITA_A,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS VITA_A, --"비타민A", ROUND(NVL(RETIN,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS RETIN, --"레티놀", ROUND(NVL(B_CAROT,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS B_CAROT, --"베타카르틴", ROUND(NVL(THIA,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS THIA, --"비타민B1", ROUND(NVL(RIBO,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS RIBO, --"비타민B2", ROUND(NVL(NIACIN,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS NIACIN, --"나이아신", ROUND(NVL(VITA_C,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS VITA_C, --"비타민C", ROUND(NVL(CHOLE,0) * (C.NEED_QTY*((100-NVL(DISUSE_RATE,0))/100)) / 100,2) AS CHOLE --"콜레스테롤" FROM FMM_STD_MENU_RECIPE A, ( SELECT RECIPE_CD, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_CLASS, RECIPE_TYPE, CUISINE_TYPE FROM FMR_STD_RECIPE_MST UNION ALL SELECT RECIPE_CD, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_CLASS, RECIPE_TYPE, CUISINE_TYPE FROM FMM_STD_RECIPE_MST WHERE UPJANG = #g_Main_Upjang# ) B, ( SELECT RECIPE_CD, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_SEQ, NEED_QTY, EDIBLE_QTY, CUT_SPEC FROM FMR_STD_RECIPE_ITEM UNION ALL SELECT RECIPE_CD, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_SEQ, NEED_QTY, EDIBLE_QTY, CUT_SPEC FROM FMM_STD_RECIPE_ITEM WHERE UPJANG =#g_Main_Upjang# ) C, ( SELECT ITEM_CODE, CAL, WATER, PROT, FAT, CARBO, FIBER, ASH, CA, P, FE, NA, K, VITA_A, RETIN, B_CAROT, THIA, RIBO, NIACIN, VITA_C, CHOLE, DISUSE_RATE FROM FMP_ITEM_NUT WHERE UPJANG = #g_Main_Upjang# UNION ALL SELECT ITEM_CODE, CAL, WATER, PROT, FAT, CARBO, FIBER, ASH, CA, P, FE, NA, K, VITA_A, RETIN, B_CAROT, THIA, RIBO, NIACIN, VITA_C, CHOLE, DISUSE_RATE FROM FSI_ITEM_NUT WHERE ITEM_CODE IN ( SELECT ITEM_CODE FROM FSI_ITEM_NUT MINUS SELECT ITEM_CODE FROM FMP_ITEM_NUT WHERE UPJANG = #g_Main_Upjang# ) ) E, FMS_ITEM_V F WHERE A.RECIPE_CD = B.RECIPE_CD AND B.RECIPE_CD = C.RECIPE_CD AND C.ITEM_CODE = E.ITEM_CODE(+) AND C.ITEM_CODE = F.ITEM_CODE AND F.ITEM_CLASS1 = 'F' AND A.UPJANG = #g_Main_Upjang# AND A.MENU_CD = #MENU_CD# ORDER BY A.RECIPE_SEQ, B.RECIPE_TYPE, B.CUISINE_TYPE, A.RECIPE_CD, C.NEED_QTY DESC
